references.reason: This paper describes GPT-4, a large language model that the current paper leverages for general reasoning and decision-making.

references.paper_title: Learning Transferable Visual Models From Natural Language Supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model used in the current work for encoding text and extracting embeddings of nodes and edges during graph matching.
This paper introduces LLaVA, a visual language model which is used in the current paper as the VLM.

references.paper_title: SG-Nav: Online 3D Scene Graph Prompting for LLM-based Zero-Shot Object Navigation
references.reason: This is a closely related work that also uses a 3D scene graph for zero-shot object navigation and serves as a baseline comparison for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Habitat: A Platform for Embodied AI Research
references.reason: This paper introduces Habitat, the simulation platform the agent uses to interact with and navigate the 3D environments.
